titleStmt.title: The unchangable lovers, no stormy winds can fright the seaman bold nor can his mind be easily contrould, his love is setled, ne'r to change his mind whilst Amarillis voweth to be kind. Tune, Cloris awake.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Conyers at the black Rave[n] in Duck-lane.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
